definition: the alignment of the wheels of a motor vehicle closer together at the bottom than at the top, to curve upward in the middle
details:
noun
- the alignment of the wheels of a motor vehicle closer together at the bottom than at the top
- a slope in the turn of a road or track
= synonyms: bank
- a slight convexity (as of the surface of a road)
verb
- to curve upward in the middle
